data.actual_result: The client moves, hiding the left tab, while the role name field expands as well as the options below
data.expected_result: The client stays the same, as does the text field
data.short_description: When on Min Width, typing a long role name extends the text field and moves the entire client
data.steps_to_repro: - put your client on min width (e.g. when on Splitscreen) - go to Server Settings > Roles - click on any role and edit the role name, typing a long name into the text bar - observe as you type
